android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

com.luvimageandvideo20.app.permission.C2.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

com.huawei.android.launcher.permission.W.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

Permission: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

playstore_details.title: Luv-iSaver Images&Videos💋💄
playstore_details.description:
Status new adds love videos, funny videos, and images. The best image status saver app is fit for storing the latest status images and the other option is to replay them at your status without making efforts for saving. Best for downloading pictures and video status without asking to send their status. The status saver will help you to download status for Whatsapp in an easy and fast way.

4K images and videos saver, downloads picture and movie material separately. Very good for saving any status. Status saver - download videos & images adds all stay images, posts, quotes, and photos in one image category and the animated clips, videos and movie stories in the specific video column. Build up your image view, love status, and picture stories. Best download photo & Videos without asking friends to send.

Save Status & Easy status saver is interesting in performing its part like:

🔷 Very good status saver saves photo & videos without asking friends to send.
🔷 Image & video status download for WhatsApp
🔷 It is a saver for images and videos both
🔷 A status can be deleted when not required
🔷 Directly report to a new status
🔷 Save to watch later if you’re in a hurry and busy
🔷 Multi-modes of collecting statuses
playstore_details.summary: Enjoy saving your video and images by using app Luv-iSaver for images and videos
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Enjoy saving your video and images by using app Luv-iSaver for images and videos
